xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.6 Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.6.2 Abyākatapada » 2.6.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
103.
1466Nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
104.
1467Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1468Ārammaṇapaccayā nahetuyā cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1469Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1470(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1471Nahetusahetukadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
1472Hetugocchakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Ārammaṇaup3 Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika >>
